name: perplexity-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol server for the Perplexity API, allowing access to Perplexity's Sonar model through MCP.
author: Ivan Vanderbyl

tools.name: perplexity_ask
tools.description: Engages in a conversation using the Sonar API. Accepts an array of messages (each with a role and content) and returns a ask completion response from the Perplexity model.

env.name: PERPLEXITY_API_KEY
env.description: API key for the Perplexity API

env.name: PERPLEXITY_MODEL
env.description: Model identifier for the Perplexity API (default: sonar-pro)
